00065 class ListProgressServer: public QueryServer<TMS_Data::ProgressOptions, TMS_Data::ListProgression> {
00066 
00067 public:

00074   ListProgressServer(const SessionServer session, const std::string& machineId):
00075     QueryServer<TMS_Data::ProgressOptions, TMS_Data::ListProgression>(session)
00076   {
00077    mcommandName = "vishnu_get_job_progress";
00078    mmachineId = machineId;
00079   }
00086   ListProgressServer(TMS_Data::ProgressOptions_ptr params, const SessionServer& session, const std::string& machineId):
00087     QueryServer<TMS_Data::ProgressOptions, TMS_Data::ListProgression>(params, session)

00098   TMS_Data::ListProgression*
00099   list() {
00100     
00101     //To check the sessionKey
00102     msessionServer.check();
00103 
00104     std::vector<std::string> results;
00105     std::vector<std::string>::iterator  iter;
00106     std::string batchJobId;
00107     int status;
00108     long startTime;
00109     long walltime;
00110 
00111     std::string acLogin = UserServer(msessionServer).getUserAccountLogin(mmachineId);
00112 
00113     TMS_Data::TMS_DataFactory_ptr ecoreFactory = TMS_Data::TMS_DataFactory::_instance();
00114     mlistObject = ecoreFactory->createListProgression();
00115 
00116     std::string sqlRequest = "SELECT jobId, jobName, wallClockLimit, endDate, status, batchJobId from vsession, job where"
00117             " vsession.numsessionid=job.vsession_numsessionid and submitMachineId='"+mmachineId+"'";
00118 
00119     if(mparameters->getJobId().size()!=0) {
00120       std::string jobId = mparameters->getJobId();
00121       sqlRequest.append(" and jobId='"+jobId+"'");
00122       boost::scoped_ptr<DatabaseResult> sqlResult(ServerTMS::getInstance()->getDatabaseVishnu()->getResult(sqlRequest.c_str()));
00123       if(sqlResult->getNbTuples() == 0) {
00124         throw TMSVishnuException(ERRCODE_UNKNOWN_JOBID);        
00125       }
00126     } else {
00127       if(mparameters->getJobOwner().size()!=0) {
00128         acLogin = mparameters->getJobOwner(); 
00129       }
00130       sqlRequest.append(" and owner='"+acLogin+"'");
00131     }
00132 
00133     sqlRequest.append("  and status < 5 order by jobId");
00134     
00135     boost::scoped_ptr<DatabaseResult> sqlResult(ServerTMS::getInstance()->getDatabaseVishnu()->getResult(sqlRequest.c_str()));
00136 
00137     if (sqlResult->getNbTuples() != 0){
00138       for (size_t i = 0; i < sqlResult->getNbTuples(); ++i) {
00139 
00140         results.clear();
00141         results = sqlResult->get(i);
00142         iter = results.begin();
00143 
00144         TMS_Data::Progression_ptr job = ecoreFactory->createProgression();
00145 
00146         job->setJobId(*iter);
00147         job->setJobName(*(++iter));
00148         walltime = convertToInt(*(++iter));
00149         job->setWallTime(walltime);
00150         job->setEndTime(convertToTimeType(*(++iter)));
00151         status = convertToInt(*(++iter));
00152         job->setStatus(status);
00153         batchJobId = *(++iter);    
00154 
00155         BatchFactory factory;
00156         BatchType batchType  = ServerTMS::getInstance()->getBatchType(); 
00157         boost::scoped_ptr<BatchServer> batchServer(factory.getBatchServerInstance(batchType));
00158 
00159         startTime = batchServer->getJobStartTime(batchJobId); 
00160         if(startTime!=0) {
00161           job->setStartTime(startTime);
00162 
00163           if(status==5) {
00164             job->setPercent(100);  
00165           } else if(status==4) {
00166             time_t currentTime = vishnu::getCurrentTimeInUTC();
00167             int percent = 0;
00168             time_t gap = currentTime-startTime;
00169             if(walltime==0) {
00170                walltime = 60;
00171             }
00172 
00173             if(gap < walltime) {
00174               double ratio =  100*(double(gap)/walltime);
00175               if(ratio > 0.0 && ratio <= 1.0) {
00176                 percent = 1;
00177               } else {
00178                 percent = static_cast<int>(ratio);
00179               }
00180             } else {
00181               percent = 99;
00182             }
00183             job->setPercent(percent);
00184           } else {
00185             job->setPercent(0);
00186           } 
00187         } else {
00188           job->setPercent(0);
00189         }
00190         mlistObject->getProgress().push_back(job); 
00191       }
00192     }
00193     
00194     mlistObject->setNbJobs(mlistObject->getProgress().size());
00195    
00196     return mlistObject;
00197 
00198   }
00199 
00200 
00205   std::string getCommandName()
00206   {
00207     return mcommandName;
00208   }
